articles.description: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim says his team "were completely lost" in slipping to a humiliating Carabao Cup defeat at Grimsby.
articles.title: Man Utd 'completely lost' in shambolic Grimsby defeat - Amorim

articles.description: Former US Open champion Daniil Medvedev is fined more than £30,000 for his behaviour in a extraordinary first-round exit.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Daniil Medvedev receives huge fine after behaviour against Benjamin Bonzi

articles.description: US captain Keegan Bradley tells BBC Sport that not playing at the Ryder Cup "hurts", but he views his role as the "ultimate job".
articles.title: Ryder Cup: Keegan Bradley says absence 'hurts' but being captain is 'ultimate job'

articles.description: With the Champions League draw taking place on Thursday, predict how a record six Premier League sides will fare this season.
articles.title: Champions League draw 2025-26: How will Premier League clubs fare?

articles.description: BBC Scotland looks at what went wrong for Russell Martin and Rangers in Belgium in their Champions League play-off collapse.
articles.title: Rangers: How 'embarrassed' Russell Martin's 'toughest night' unfolded as the Gers exit Champions League

articles.description: Taylor Townsend says Jelena Ostapenko told her she has "no class" and "no education" after the American beat her in the US Open second round.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Taylor Townsend says Jelena Ostapenko told her she had 'no class' and 'no education' after loss

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the history of the biggest FA Cup and EFL Cup upsets after Grimsby's shock win against Manchester United.
articles.title: Grimsby 2-2 Manchester United (12-11 on pens): Where does it rank among best upsets?

articles.description: Kansas City Chiefs wide receiver Rashee Rice has been given a six-game ban by the NFL for violating the league's personal conduct policy.
articles.title: NFL: Kansas City Chiefs wide receiver Rashee Rice gets six-game ban for car crash

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says he "did not feel that great" as he came back from a set down to beat American qualifier Zachary Svajda and reach the US Open third round.
articles.title: US Open 2025 results: Novak Djokovic fights back to beat Zachary Svajda and reach third round, Joao Fonseca out

articles.description: Holders Newcastle will take on League One Bradford City at home in the third round of the Carabao Cup. Full draw included.
articles.title: Carabao Cup draw: Newcastle v Bradford, Liverpool v Southampton, Arsenal, Manchester City
